about_the_game: Euclid Valley is an arcade-roguelike with minimalist graphics and fast paced difficult levels. The goal... to survive as long as possible against the unending hoards of enemies.
detailed_description: Euclid Valley is an arcade-roguelike with minimalist graphics and fast paced difficult levels. The goal... to survive as long as possible against the unending hoards of enemies.
name: Euclid Valley Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to Euclid Valley, a small arcade-rougelike with fast paced combat and difficult levels. Explore an expansive HUB world between levels and uncover lost secrets ranging from small powerups to entire hidden levels.
